data.title: Cluster Architecture Overview

visualizations.label: Deployment Dependencies
visualizations.content:
graph TD
    A[nginx-ingress] --> B[api-gateway]
    B --> C[user-service]
    B --> D[order-service]
    C --> E[(PostgreSQL)]
    D --> E
    D --> F[(Redis Cache)]

insights: The nginx-ingress controller routes traffic to the api-gateway
Both user-service and order-service share the PostgreSQL database
Order-service uses Redis for caching to improve performance
